      • setWeeklyPricesForRoom

        public double[][] setWeeklyPricesForRoom(Room room,
                                         double[] NewPrices,
                                         double[][] OldPrices,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<Room> RoomTypes)
        Set the prices for different types of room for each day of the week
        Parameters:
        room - the type of room you want to set the price for
        NewPrices - an array of the new prices for the week
        OldPrices - an array of the old prices for the week
        RoomTypes - an array list of the types of rooms in the hotel
        Returns:
        old room prices
